segments.text: I think I going to need some iced water too . Is there an extra charge for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we charge 50 cents for water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . Could you give me some more napkins , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I would also like some sweet and sour sauce and pepper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll put all that into the bag for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I owe you anything for the sauce , pepper and napkins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there is no charge for those .
segments.speaker: S2
